title: Uptown Dallas Rosewood Estate Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Immerse yourself in the Southern elegance of this exquisite 1920s Dallas estate, transformed into an ultra-luxe sanctuary. Nestled within Uptown’s leafy enclave, Rosewood Mansion on Turtle Creek effortlessly marries the world-class sophistication of the Rosewood brand with timeless Texan grandeur. At The Mansion Restaurant, savour exquisite French fine dining elevated by bold Dallas flair and heartfelt Southern hospitality.

Retreat to The Mansion Bar, an iconic Dallas institution, where evocative Texas landscapes, equestrian motifs and rich cognac-hued leather walls set the stage for signature tequila cocktails and impeccable service. For a timeless ritual, enjoy high tea in the chandelier-lit Mansion Library, then unwind with a float in the outdoor pool before a bespoke signature massage.
offer_address: 2821 Turtle Creek Boulevard, Dallas, Texas 75219, United States

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Dallas Love Field - Med Area
title: Chic Dallas Escape near Downtown with Indoor Pool & Onsite Bar & Grill
description: Enjoy the very best of Dallas with a stay at Crowne Plaza Dallas Love Field - Med Area, an IHG Hotel, just minutes from the city's vibrant downtown. Indulge in delicious Texas-style cuisine at Bristol Bar & Grill, or unwind with a refreshing dip in the hotel's sparkling indoor pool. The hotel's proximity to the Dallas World Aquarium, Perot Museum of Nature and Science, and the renowned Dallas Museum of Art offers endless exploration opportunities.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dallas Love Field - Med Area, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 7050 N. Stemmons Freeway, Dallas, Texas 75247, United States

title: Stylish Dallas Downtown City Break near Convention Centre & World Aquarium
description: Positioned just moments from the Convention Centre, Crowne Plaza Dallas Downtown, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect stay in the heart of one of Texas’s most vibrant cities. You’ll be surrounded by plenty of things to see and do, with Dallas World Aquarium, Dallas Zoo and beloved sports stadium American Airlines Centre all within walking distance - return to the hotel's onsite Thrive Restaurant for upscale New American plates in a laidback setting.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dallas Downtown, an IHG Hotel

title: Ultra-Modern Dallas Neighbourhood Stay with Cocktail Bar & Pool
description: Pristine modernity in the heart of Dallas’ thriving cultural centre, Kimpton Pittman Hotel, an IHG Hotel provides a perfect amalgamation of classic charm and contemporary design to provide top-tier relaxation. Admire the collection of modern art and sleek furnishings that decorate the expansive spaces as you enjoy a crisp beer or a creative cocktail on Deep End’s poolside open-air deck or relax in the plush confines of Elm & Good with a hearty, tavern-inspired feed.
location_description: Kimpton Pittman Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2551 Elm Street, Deep Ellum, Dallas, Texas 75226, United States

title: Downtown Dallas Stay Moments from Convention Center with Outdoor Heated Infinity Pool & Luxury Spa
description:
Experience the grandeur of Texas with a modern, sleek stay in downtown Dallas. Located adjacent to the Dallas Convention Center, this hotel offers a gateway to the city's vibrant arts and culture scene, including the Dallas Museum of Art and the Perot Museum of Nature and Science.

Satisfy your palate at one of the plethora of onsite dining options, with dining options at Restaurants on Lamar at your fingertips: from souther-style favourites at Texas Spice to the sophisticated steakhouse, Bob's Steak & Chop House. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Mokara Spa for a rejuvenating treatment or enjoy a drink at the The Owners Box sports bar.
